Services & Suppliers

Purple Shark Embroidery

We offer custom embroidery, screen printing, logo design & laser engraving.

We provide custom solutions for workwear, corporate apparel, team uniforms and promotional products.

AJM
A Canadian Wholesale headwear provider, providing a wide variety of promotional headwear solutions.
Alpha Broder
Executive styling to teamwear, designed to fit your work and personal lifestyle.
Sanmar Canada
Provides a wide selection of Imprintable Apparel, T-shirts, Jackets, Tote bags, and many more.
Kobe Sportswear
A Proud supplier of Imprintable athletic apparel and are worn by both professional and amateuer level atheletes.
Jerico
A Canadian made Social Conscious Apparel, making quality garments that stand the test of time.
Technosport
A Canadian distributor of promotional and corporate activewear clothing.
